landingPage.privacyText:
Your data will be kept safe with us

All posts are anonymous and private posts are only accessible to you.

If you ever feel like your privacy is breached, you can delete all your posts, and our database will remove them immediately.

So don't worry and write away!
landingPage.pwaInstallText:
Want easier access to Pinocchio?
Add us to your Homescreen Now!

signUpPage.noRequestExtreme: Come on in and join our community!
signUpPage.secretWordShort: Secret word is too shortðŸ˜³ Use >= 8 characters
writingCategoryPage.chooseCategory: Choose a category for your story:
writingCategoryPage.publishMeQuestion: Do you wish to proceed with publishing your story for yourself?
writingCategoryPage.publishAllQuestion: Do you wish to proceed with publishing your story for everyone?
writingPage.invalidInfo: You have entered no/invalid text. Please try again.
homePage.delveStories: Delve into our stories of the good, the bad and the magical
homePage.delveInspire: Delve into our inspirational and beautiful stories
homePage.dailyThoughts: Write down your daily thoughts, for they are part of your alluring tale
homePage.lifeTale: Write down your life's tales because good or bad, they are part of your alluring tale
homePage.hotLineText:
Thank you for taking good care of yourself.
We are proud of you!

Do you wish to contact our counsellors through the 24-hour helpline?
guidelinesPage.avoidHurt: All posts and comments should be kept courteous to avoid hurting other community members.
guidelinesPage.offensivePost: 2. do not post offensive posts and links:
guidelinesPage.disrespectful: Any posts disrespectful to those of other genders, races, classes, or sexual orientations are not allowed.
guidelinesPage.materialForbidden: Any material that constitutes defamation, abuse, threats, or harassment is strictly forbidden.
guidelinesPage.noAfraid: 3. don't be afraid to share and lend a helping hand!:
guidelinesPage.shareThoughts: Try to share your thoughts and experiences regarding mental health. We're sure many others can relate, even if you don't think so!
guidelinesPage.helpFriend: If you can, help out a fellow friend and offer some encouraging words to those facing tough times.
forgetPasswordPage.noWorriesText: No worries, we got your back!
commentPage.noComments: There is no comments right now. Write Now to encourage others in this community!
commentPage.notLoggedIn: Log in to write comments that encourage the other!
commentPage.notEmailVerified: Verify your email address to write comments that encourage the other!
personalPage.passwordError: New password is too short or doesn't match with retype password
personalPage.confirmDelete: Do you really want to delete all your posts?
